sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="true" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<j:set var="jvar_app" value="sn.pm.home" />
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_title" jelly="true">
		var title = "",
        sysClassName = jelly.sysparm_sys_class_name;
        var gr = new GlideRecord(sysClassName);
        title = gr.getPlural();
		title;
	</g:evaluate>
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_error_message" object="true" jelly="true">
        var message = '';
        var isMobile = PPMDeviceHelper.isMobileDevice();
		var isTablet = PPMDeviceHelper.isTabletDevice();
		
        if (jelly.jvar_isMSIE == 'true') {
          if (jelly.jvar_MSIE_vn ${AMP}lt; 10 ) {
            message = 'unsupported_browser';
          }
        } else if (isMobile || isTablet) {
          message = 'unsupported_device';
        }
    message;
	</g2:evaluate>
	<g:evaluate>
		new PPMUsageAnalytics().projectWorkspaceLaunch();
	</g:evaluate>
	<g:inline template="ie_checker.xml" />
	<j2:choose>
		<j2:when test= "$[jvar_error_message != '']">
			<g:inline template="pm_landing_page_error_message.xml"/>
		</j2:when>
		<j2:otherwise>
			<j:set var="jvar_media" value="${RP.getParameterValue('sysparm_media')}" />
			<j:if test="${jvar_media == 'print'}">
				<g:requires name="scripts/lib/jquery_includes.js" />
			</j:if>
			<g:inline template="pm_home_messages.xml" />
			<g:inline template="html_page_pm_home.xml">
				<g:inline template="pm_home.xml" />
			</g:inline>
		</j2:otherwise>
	</j2:choose>
	<script>
        window.GlideWebAnalytics.trackEvent("com.snc.financial_planning_pmo", "Project_Workspace", "Project Workspace");
    </script>
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: runbook_home
